mapper.select: select count(work_num) as employees from sys_user_number where use_status=1

SELECT sum( workTime ) FROM ( SELECT ( TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute ,start_time,end_time)/60 ) AS workTime FROM attendance_info WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by attendance_id) AS work_time
select count(work_num) as employees from sys_user_number where use_status=2 and update_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT sum( wt.workTime ) FROM ( SELECT ( TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute ,o.start_time,o.end_time)/60) AS workTime FROM attendance_schedule_order o RIGHT JOIN attendance_schedule s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE #{attendanceDate} BETWEEN s.start_date and s.end_date ) AS wt
SELECT d.dept_name, count( n.work_num ) AS employees FROM sys_user_number n LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON n.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE n.use_status=1 GROUP BY d.dept_name

SELECT sum(work_time )as work_time,wt.dept_name FROM ( SELECT (TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute ,o.start_time,o.end_time)/60) AS work_time,d.dept_name FROM attendance_schedule_order o RIGHT JOIN attendance_schedule s ON o.order_id = s.order_id left join sys_user_number n on s.work_num=n.work_num left join sys_dept d on n.dept_id=d.dept_id WHERE #{attendanceDate} between s.start_date and s.end_date ) AS wt GROUP BY wt.dept_name

SELECT sum(work_time )as work_time,wt.dept_name FROM ( SELECT (TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute ,i.start_time,i.end_time)/60) AS work_time,d.dept_name FROM attendance_info i left join sys_user_number n on i.work_num=n.work_num left join sys_dept d on n.dept_id=d.dept_id WHERE i.attendance_date=#{attendanceDate} ) AS wt GROUP BY wt.dept_name
